details: Advisor: Dr. Tim Menzies
Dissertation: Guidelines for the Application of Neural Technologies in Software Analytics (or: How to Do More with Less in SE)

education.degree: B.E. Computer Science -- Advisor: Dr. Snehanshu Saha

details: Improved customer-facing product runtime by 24.8\% and reduced peak memory usage duration by 21.3\%.
Helped improve complaint drafting results by 115\% and motion drafting by 28.4\% of usefulness.
Led initiative to use Bayesian optimization for prompt tuning.
Led design for migration from RAG to agentic drafting system.
Developed fast passage filtering approach based on contrastive loss and tabu search.
Python, Litestar, React, TypeScript, Tailwind
--- Performance improvements ---
Implemented lazy-loading for modules, reducing peak memory usage time from 86.4\% to 68\% of the runtime
Profiled LLM calls and fixed inefficiencies, leading to a 10\% reduction in runtime.
Refactored and parallelized code for a 16.4\% speedup.
--- Drafting improvements ---
Complaint improvements: 40\% --> 70\% --> 86\% usefulness.
Motion improvements: 59.2\% --> 81.6\% --> 76\% usefulness.
Proposed tabu search and Bayesian optimization methods for prompt tuning.
\textbf{Workflow improvement:} Led initiative to use Bayesian optimization for prompt tuning.
--- Innovation ---
Passage filtering: InfoNCE + alignment and uniformity losses, tabu search with convex hull-based distance.
Agentic system: state transition-based, using message bus, almost like CQRS
\textbf{Technology:} Python, Litestar, React, TypeScript, Tailwind
\textbf{State-of-the-art hyper-parameter optimization:} Proposed a novel hyper-parameter optimization method that outperforms prior SOTA and is 36.4\% faster.

\textbf{Better, faster deep learning for SE:} Improved defect prediction by up to 123\% (F-1 score), code smell detection by up to 30\% (AUC), issue lifetime prediction by up to 76\% (accuracy), automated microservice partitioning by up to 285\% (modularity) compared to prior SOTA.
\textbf{Semi-supervised learning:} Achieved state-of-the-art results (up to 100\% improvement in AUC) on static code warnings analysis using 10\% of the labels.
\textbf{Teaching:} Teaching assistant for 830 students in total, over 5 semesters, for CSC 230 (C and Software Tools), CSC 510 (Software Engineering), and CSC 591/791 (Automated Software Engineering)
HPO: 36.4\% compared to Hyperopt, the fastest of the other SOTA optimizers. Compared on same datasets used in NeurIPS BBO Challenge 2020; p = 0.016.
TA (with 2 others) for 52 students for a graduate Automated Software Engineering course.
TA (with 4 others) for 289 students for a graduate Software Engineering course.
TA (with 3 others) for 97 students for a graduate Automated Software Engineering course.
TA (with 4 others) for 233 students for a graduate Software Engineering course.
\textbf{Better, faster deep learning for SE:} Improved defect prediction by up to 123\% (F-1 score), code smell detection by up to 30\% (AUC)
\textbf{Semi-supervised learning:} Achieved state-of-the-art results on static code warnings analysis using 10\% of the labels.
TA (with 1 other) for 159 students for an undergraduate C and Software Tools course.
Implemented profile locks for Prime Video on Echo Show devices.
\textbf{Technology:} React Native, TypeScript
Developed a full-stack system to publish announcements in scorecards used by delivery service partners (DSPs).
\textbf{Technology:} React/Redux, TypeScript, Redux Saga, DynamoDB, Java Spring

projects.title: RAG System for Zotero
details: WIP: Building a RAG system with a custom PDF parser for academic papers using the user's Zotero library.

projects.title: RAISE
details: Sole developer for a PEP8-compliant, ML Python package used by our research lab and others for replicable results. Downloaded 55k times.

projects.title: Programmable Resumes
details: Developed a specification and implementation for modular, customizable resumes with support for two popular LaTeX templates. Wrote this resume using this tool.

projects.title: pysh
details: Developed a superset of Python that allows running Shell code natively, with a VS Code syntax highlighting extension.

projects.title: Google/Meta Data Mining
details: Data science project to use Google Takeout and Meta user data to suggest products to advertise to a user from Amazon best-sellers using DistilGPT-2, and achieved 0.6 F-1 score.

projects.title: Threaded Discussions Website
details: Companion website for video calls that allows for Reddit-style, threaded discussions.

projects.title: NearConnect
details: iOS app to connect with people nearby using multicast peer-to-peer connections.

projects.title: Novel Drug Repurposing Hypotheses
details: Identified novel drug repurposing hypotheses using text mining of radio transcripts, and verified results using a knowledge graph.

projects.title: Personalized Chatbot
details: Fine-tuned a GPT-2 345M model on 730k messages from Telegram logs to create a personalized chatbot.

projects.title: Intelligent Tutoring System
details: Implemented an Intelligent Tutoring System backend using Bayesian Knowledge Tracing and a novel question selection algorithm.

projects.title: Human Activity Data Project
details: Collected personal activity data for 9 months, grouped tasks into 21 categories. Analyzed most productive hours of the day.

projects.title: Astronomy Image Restoration
details: Developed a machine learning approach to restore astronomical images affected by PSF anisotropy and smearing in crowded-field photometry,  improving data retention and accuracy in differential imaging analysis of long-baseline optical time series.

projects.title: JournalBear
details: Cross-platform journal application with AES-256 encryption. Rated 4/5 by Softpedia.

projects.title: Results Scraper
details: Website for scraping university examination results and displaying charts and printable reports, with caching.

projects.title: Video Sharing Website
details: Simplified implementation of a video-sharing website with subscriptions and custom searching.

projects.title: Xtreme Calculations
details: Windows math software to solve scientific and mathematical problems, with over 30k downloads across multiple sites.

projects.title: Video Indexer
details: Cross-platform desktop application to detect the time(s) a given keyword was spoken in a video.

projects.title: Web development projects
details: Projects include URL shortener, rogue-like dungeon crawler game, voting application, Simon game, land surface temperature heatmap, and mapping meteorite impacts across the globe.

honors.title: Google Developer Expert - ML and GCP
details: The Google Developer Experts program is a global network of highly experienced technology experts, influencers, and thought leaders who have expertise in Google technologies, are active leaders in the space, natural mentors, and contribute to the wider developer and startup ecosystem.

honors.title: Google Cloud Champion Innovator - Cloud AI/ML
details: Champion Innovators are a global network of more than 500 professionals, nominated by Googlers, who are technical experts in Google Cloud products and services. Each Champion specializes in one of nine different technical categories.
